headerDisplay: [homebridge-ratgdo](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-ratgdo) provides HomeKit support to Chamberlain and Liftmaster garage door openers that use the Ratgdo hardware control board without using myQ. This version is a beta and should not be relied upon daily.
footerDisplay: See the [homebridge-ratgdo developer page](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-ratgdo) for detailed documentation, including [feature options](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-ratgdo#feature-options). This version is a beta and should not be relied upon daily.

port.title: MQTT Broker Port
port.description: Set the port to use for the builtin MQTT broker. Ensure you set the Ratgdo hardware control board to use the same MQTT server port.

name.title: Plugin Name
name.description: Name to use for Homebridge logging purposes. Default: Ratgdo.

items.title: Feature Option
items.description: Enter only one option per entry. See the plugin documentation for the complete list of available options or use the feature options webUI tab above.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: Logging verbosity for debugging. Default: false.

items.description: Ensure your Ratgdo hardware control board is configured to use the IP address of your Homebridge server for the MQTT server IP
Use the feature options webUI tab above instead of manually configuring feature options here.
These settings should be rarely used or needed by most people. Use these with caution.
